price: 7. Ceux qui ont cru et accompli les bonnes œuvres, ceux là sont les meilleures de toutes les créatures.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika hum khayru al-bariyati
